meanings.sent1: The dark clouds foreshadows a storm approaching.
meanings.sent2: The sudden drop in temperature foreshadows the coming of winter.
meanings.sent3: The loud thunder foreshadows a grumpy cloud's arrival.
meanings.sent4: The distant howling of wolves foreshadows danger lurking in the shadows.
meanings.sent5: The eerie silence of the forest foreshadows an impending mystery.

meanings.definition: To give a warning or indication of a future event
meanings.sent1: The old sailor's tale foreshadows the dangers of sailing in rough seas.
meanings.sent2: The black cat crossing your path foreshadows bad luck.
meanings.sent3: The broken mirror foreshadows seven years of misfortune.
meanings.sent4: The creaking floorboards foreshadows an unwelcome visitor in the night.
meanings.sent5: The distant sound of sirens foreshadows trouble on the horizon.
